channel.title: Thoughts about the samples from mars series?
channel.description:
This includes all these Auxy packs: 707 from mars 808 from mars 909 from mars CR78 from mars DX100 from mars SK-1 from mars Soviet synths from mars OB from mars 707 101 Found sounds
What did you think about them, and what keyboards/drum machines would you want next?

item.title: Thoughts about the samples from mars series?
item.dc:creator: SmackdownBeta
item.description:
And for… sigh… SYNTHWAVE producers, they’ll probably need a 505. In Ableton Live, it sounds like some 80’s mainstream drums right there.

Read full topic
item.source: Thoughts about the samples from mars series?

item.title: Thoughts about the samples from mars series?
item.dc:creator: SmackdownBeta
item.description:
For some reason I feel like Auxy has a better 909 than GarageBand and Ableton Live.
